Format.ReportTitle: Women of Reproductive Age by Disability

SQL.SQLRaw: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') AS AGE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 49 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS FEMALE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS SENSORY, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS PHYSICAL, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS MENTAL, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS Not_Reported FROM cap_citizen WHERE DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >=15 AND 49 GROUP BY AGE UNION ALL SELECT 'TOTAL', SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '1'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '2'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '3'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '4') FROM cap_citizen

QueryColumn.Name: FEMALE
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 49 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: SENSORY
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: PHYSICAL
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: MENTAL
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: Not_Reported
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_disability_id = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS
